name: Fansly Downloader
tagline: Save approved Fansly media for private libraries.
description:
Fansly Downloader helps creators and authorized viewers archive Fansly photos and videos they have permission to access. Instead of juggling unstable browser extensions, it keeps downloads fast, consistent, and organized.

Use it to backup subscriber content, deliver media to clients, or keep personal archives available when you're working offline while respecting creator rights.
seo_description: Download approved Fansly photos and videos for personal archiving. Fast, private Fansly downloader for authorized users.
features: Download media you are authorized to view in original quality
Preserve file naming and folder organization for each creator
Batch queue large drops without throttling or duplicate downloads
Local-first workflows ensure sensitive content stays on your device
Works on Windows, macOS, Linux, and major browsers

pricing.label: One-time payment
pricing.note: Contact us for current licensing options.

faqs.question: Does Fansly Downloader require my account login?
faqs.answer: You authenticate directly with Fansly in your browser. The downloader only saves media you already have permission to view.

faqs.question: Can I share the files I download?
faqs.answer: No. Content must remain for personal or client-approved use according to creator and platform policies.

faqs.question: How does it handle large drops?
faqs.answer: Queue entire creator drops and Fansly Downloader will process them sequentially with automatic retries.

faqs.question: Is download history stored anywhere?
faqs.answer: Activity stays on your device; we do not collect analytics or usage logs.

faqs.question: Does it support videos and photos?
faqs.answer: Yes. Video, photo, and gallery media download in their original resolutions.

reviews.name: Carmen Blake
reviews.review: I manage media for a small Fansly team and this downloader keeps everything organized with original filenames. Huge time saver.
reviews.title: Keeps creator backups tidy

reviews.name: Renzo Miles
reviews.review: Fansly Downloader batches entire drops without stalls. Perfect for staying on schedule when creators send bulk uploads.
reviews.title: Reliable Fansly archiving

reviews.name: Avery Sloan
reviews.review: I like keeping offline access when I travel. Downloads stay local and the quality matches the originals every time.
reviews.title: Great for personal archives
